# Affiliate Product Review Website

A professional, SEO-friendly affiliate product website built with React, TypeScript, and Firebase Firestore for real-time updates. Deploys automatically to GitHub Pages.

## Features

- **Real-time Product Updates**: Products sync automatically from Firebase Firestore
- **Professional UI**: Clean, modern design with Tailwind CSS
- **SEO Optimized**: Meta tags, JSON-LD structured data, Open Graph
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach
- **Product Filtering**: Search, category filter, and sorting
- **Product Details Page**: Full specifications, pros/cons, image gallery
- **Affiliate Disclosure & Privacy Policy**: Compliant with affiliate marketing guidelines
- **GitHub Pages Deployment**: Automated CI/CD pipeline

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Routing**: React Router v6
- **Database**: Firebase Firestore (real-time)
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages + GitHub Actions

## Prerequisites

- Node.js 18+ and npm
- GitHub account
- Firebase account (free tier)

## Setup Instructions

### 1. Clone the Repository

```bash
git clone <your-repo-url>
cd affiliate-product-site
